MESSAGE: Then I'll come down the chimney
little chick, get out here NOW!
Fine, then I'll just make a spit cloud big enough to knock your house down.
Well, might as well get a snack
Little chick get out here NOW
Fine then I'll make another spit cloud.
True, THEN I'LL USE THE DOOR!
How are you going to do that
DO YOU THINK I DIDN'T LOCK IT!
